aboutUsPage.headerDescription: Metric-Conversions.org is the most popular unit conversions website in the world. With over 30,000 conversions between over 400 units including temperature, length, area, volume, weight and currencies in over 45 languages, the site is well equipped to offer this comprehensive and easy to use unit converter app.
aboutUsPage.mainPageDescription: This is a new app and we understand that there will be plenty of ways that we can improve it. We would love to hear your feedback, please email us at
aboutUsPage.bottomPageDescription: If you like it, please help spread the word. Here is the link to the app information page along with a conveinient email link for sending it.
